titleStmt.title: The iust dovvnefall of ambition, adultery, murder at the end of which are added Westons, and Mistris Turners last teares, shed for the murder of Sir Thomas Ouerbury poysoned in the tower; who for the fact, suffered deserued execution at Tiburne the 14. of Nouember last. 1615. Mercy sweet Iesus.
Bloody downfall of adultery.

publicationStmt.publisher: For R. H[iggenbotham] and are to be sold at his shop at the Cardinalls Hat without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The iust downefall of ambition &c.
Printer's name and publication date from STC.
"Mistris Turners teares" and "Master Westons teares" have caption title.
Identified as STC 18920a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the Cardinalls Hat without Newgate
